api_list.api_description: Generates an avatar of a specified style.

required_parameters.name: style_name
required_parameters.description: The style of the avatar, e.g., 'pixel-art', 'lorelei'.

optional_parameters.name: seed
optional_parameters.description: Seed value for generating a repeatable avatar.

query: Can you find artworks related to Van Gogh in the Art Institute of Chicago's collection, and generate an avatar with a 'pixel-art' style using the name 'ArtLover' as the seed?
